00236   void getParAdvancedFit(number&   GChi2, number&  GRid, number&  GErr,
00237                          number&  GTheta, number&  GPhi, AMSPoint&  GP0,
00238                          number HChi2[2], number HRid[2], number HErr[2], number HTheta[2], 
00239                          number HPhi[2], AMSPoint  HP0[2] ) const{
00240     GChi2=0; 
00241     GRid=0; 
00242     GErr=0;
00243     GTheta=0; 
00244     GPhi=0; 
00245     GP0=0;
00246     for(int ii=0;ii<2;ii++){
00247       HChi2[ii]=0; 
00248       HRid[ii]=0; 
00249       HErr[ii]=0; 
00250        HTheta[ii]=0; 
00251        HPhi[ii]=0; 
00252        HP0[ii]=0;
00253     }

00255   }
00256 
00257   void getParFastFit(number&  Chi2, number& Rid, number&  Err, 
00258                      number&  Theta, number & Phi, AMSPoint&  X0)const {
00259     
00260     Chi2=sqrt(_ChisqX*_ChisqX+_ChisqY*_ChisqY);
00261     Rid=_Rigidity; 
00262     Err=_ErrRinv; 
00263     Theta=_Theta; 
00264     Phi=_Phi; 
00265     X0[0]=_P0x;
00266     X0[1]=_P0y;
00267     X0[2]=_P0z;
00268 
00269   }

00280     phi=0;
00281     length=0;
00282   }
